No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, "The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't." And I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment which I think is the major problem facing America right now, and I think and I hope that this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech.
